projects.welcomeTutorialTitle: Welcome to your Project Management Hub
projects.welcomeTutorialDescription: Watch the 2-minute tour or skim the quick highlights below.
projects.boardViewDescription: Try moving a project between stages by dragging and dropping to continue.
projects.boardViewMobileDescription: The board view shows your projects organized by stages in columns.
projects.boardViewContent: The board view is perfect for visual project management. You can drag projects between columns to update their status. Try moving at least one project to a different stage to continue the tutorial.
projects.boardViewMobileContent: This visual workflow shows projects in different stages. On mobile devices, tap on a project to change its status instead of dragging.
projects.boardViewTooltip: Drag a project to another column to continue
projects.listViewDescription: Click the 'List' tab above to view project information in a table format.
projects.listViewContent: The list view is perfect when you need to see detailed information about multiple projects at once, along with sorting and filtering. It's great for analysis and informed decisions.
projects.listViewTooltip: Click the List tab above to continue
projects.archivedDescription: Click the 'Archived' tab above to see how completed projects are organized.
projects.archivedContent: The archived view keeps your workspace tidy by separating completed projects from active ones. It helps you focus on current work while keeping past projects accessible for reference and portfolio building.
projects.archivedTooltip: Click the Archived tab above to continue
projects.completionDescription: Nice work! You've tried all three project views and know when to use each one.
projects.completionIntro: What you accomplished in this mission:
projects.completionCallout: ⚡ Continue setup to configure your packages and schedule your first session.
projects.completionContent: Board is best for visual workflow updates, List for detailed analysis, and Archived for keeping finished projects tidy. Switch views as you work to stay efficient.
projects.pageSubtitle: Manage all your projects in one place

toasts.move_sync_failed: Project move failed to sync. Board reloaded.

reminders.reminderContentPlaceholder: What should we remind you about?
reminders.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this reminder? This action cannot be undone.

emptyState.sheetTitle: Sessions keep the shoot day under control

sections.title: Prep once, reuse effortlessly
sections.description: Attach questionnaires, shot lists, or workflows to the session so setup runs itself the moment it's booked.

sections.title: Automate messages and payments
sections.description: Confirmed sessions can trigger confirmations, day-before nudges, and balance reminders without extra work.

sections.title: Always know what's next
sections.description: Session cards surface date, time, location, and status so you can glance at the week and make confident plans.

quick.full_helper: Records a single payment that closes both the deposit and any remaining balance.

emptyState.sheetTitle: To-dos keep project follow-ups on track
emptyState.sheetDescription: Use lightweight reminders tied directly to the project so prep, delivery, and follow-up steps aren’t forgotten.

sections.title: Capture quick follow-ups
sections.description: Jot down editing tasks, album approvals, or delivery notes while they’re fresh so nothing slips.

sections.title: See progress in context
sections.description: Each item sits beside project payments, sessions, and notes—no separate task app to check.

sections.title: Plan handoffs with confidence
sections.description: Cross items off as you deliver previews, final galleries, or prints so clients always get what was promised.

archivedProject.banner: This project is archived. Most actions are disabled. While archived, sessions and reminders are hidden from calendars, the Sessions page, and activity lists. Use More → Restore to enable editing and visibility again.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Project
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the project "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone. It will permanently delete the project and ALL related data including sessions, payments, tasks, services, and activities.

danger_zone.title: Danger Zone
danger_zone.description: These actions are destructive and irreversible. Proceed with caution.

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.description: These actions are destructive and irreversible. Proceed with caution.
dangerZone.delete_description: Permanently remove all of your data from our servers
dangerZone.delete_warning: This action will permanently delete all of your leads, projects, sessions, reminders, payments, and related data. It cannot be undone and all data will be lost forever.
dangerZone.deletion_details: This will permanently delete all of your data, including:
dangerZone.cannot_be_undone: This action cannot be undone. Enter your account password to confirm.
dangerZone.enter_password_confirm: Please enter your password to confirm this action.
dangerZone.delete_complete_desc: All of your data has been permanently deleted.
dangerZone.deletion_error: An error occurred while deleting your data. Please try again.

delete_dialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the "{{fieldName}}" field? This will permanently remove the field definition and all data stored for existing leads. This action cannot be undone.

taxBilling.description: Set organization defaults for invoices and service pricing.

legalEntity.freelanceHint: Use when you accept direct payments and do not issue VAT invoices.

companyName.label: Company or billing name

taxNumber.label: Tax / ID number

defaultVatRate.label: Default VAT rate
defaultVatRate.helper: Applied to new services and packages unless overridden.

defaultVatMode.label: Default VAT handling
defaultVatMode.exclusiveHint: VAT will be added to line totals.

pricesIncludeVat.label: Catalog prices include VAT
pricesIncludeVat.helper: When enabled, new services mark VAT as included by default.

freelanceWarning.title: Double-check VAT defaults
